FavoriteDetailBinding
 
FavoriteDetailsFragment
A fragment to display detailed information about a selected favorite flight.
FlightDatabase
Represents a Room database for storing flight-related data.
FlightDetailBinding
 
FlightDetailsFragment
A fragment to display detailed information about a selected flight result.
FlightFavorites
An activity that displays a list of favorite flight results.
FlightResult
Represents a flight result entity containing information about a specific flight.
FlightResultBinding
 
FlightResultDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for interacting with the FlightResult entity in the database.
FlightTracker
Represents the Flight Tracker page, where users can track flights and view details.
FlightTrackerViewModel
ViewModel class that stores and manages the flight and favorite results data for the Flight Tracker app.

FragmentImageDetailsBinding

HomeFragment
 
ImageDetailsFragment
 
ImageGenerator
 
ImageListFragment
 
ItemImageListBinding
 
LeaderboardActivity
The LeaderboardActivity displays a list of user scores in descending order.
LeaderboardAdapter
The LeaderboardAdapter class is responsible for displaying user scores in a RecyclerView.
LeaderboardLayoutBinding
 
LeaderboardListBinding
 
LoadImage
 
LoadImageAdapter
 
LoadImageAdapter.OnDeleteClickListener
 
MainActivity
 
QuestionAdapter
The QuestionAdapter class is responsible for displaying trivia questions in a RecyclerView.
QuestionAdapter.ViewHolder
 
QuestionDetails
The QuestionDetails class represents a single question retrieved from a trivia API.
QuestionsActivity
The QuestionsActivity displays a list of trivia questions for the user to answer.
SplashScreenActivity
The SplashScreenActivity displays a splash screen for a brief period before transitioning to the TriviaActivity.
TriviaActivity
The TriviaActivity provides options to start a trivia game, view the leaderboard, and get help.
TriviaQuestionLayoutBinding
 
UserScore
The UserScore class represents the user's score and related information.
UserScoreDao
 
UserScoreDatabase
The UserScoreDatabase class represents the Room database for managing user scores.
UserScoreRepository
